properties.description: Nikos Kyrpides, head of the Genome Biology group at the DOE Joint Genome Institute discusses current challenges in the field of microbial genomics on June 2, 2010 at the "Sequencing, Finishing, Analysis in the Future" meeting in Santa Fe, NM
properties.research_org: Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory (LBNL), Berkeley, CA (United States)
properties.research_sponsor: USDOE Office of Science (SC), Biological and Environmental Research (BER) (SC-23)
